ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s a Silk Evening Shirt (or tunic). And I d thank you to quit oggling me! The ladies never minded the feel of silk on my skin, that s for sure! *grins*
ygData.messageBody:
>I tried using the current version
>of the amulet along with - this may sound funny - one of those "gowns" you
>can buy in the Qeynos market. Well, it's either a gown or a blouse. I
>forget, anyways it looks like a shirt, but it gives +5 Cha, and I don't know
>if it's still available. It was pretty funny to be walking around with it on
>and my buddies would make comments on it... (I kept having to defend myself,
>"I'm not a transvestite bard, I SWEAR!!!"). Anyways - they would shut up if
>they wanted me to buy there equipment cheaper than they could ever hope for
>from a merchant.


It's a Silk Evening Shirt (or tunic). And I'd thank you to quit oggling me!
The ladies never minded the feel of silk on my skin, that's for sure!

*grins*


-----------------------------------------------------
Jythri, Pencerdd of The Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com
